summary: 1994  was a common year starting on Saturday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
1994  was a common year starting on Saturday  of the Gregorian calendar, the 1994th year of the Common Era  and Anno Domini  designations, the 994th year of the 2nd millennium, the 94th year of the 20th century, and the 5th year of the 1990s decade. The year 1994 was designated as the "International Year of the Family" and the "International Year of Sport and the Olympic Ideal" by the United Nations.
The last Russian troops were moved out of the Baltic states this year, in August.
